extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    Level 3 and (MATH221 or MATH280 or MATH281), or permission of the Department.

basic.description: In-depth follow-up to high school geometry: striking new results/connections; analysis/proof of new/familiar results from various perspectives; extensions (projective geometry, e.g.); relation of classical unsolvable constructions to modern algebra; models/technology for geometric exploration.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Elementary Geometry - an Advanced Perspective
